ygData.subject: Re: Re: [EverQuest] Calling All Heroes
ygData.msgSnippet: I m hoping that if I play a lower level monster and get xp as my higher level it might help alot because I m finding it hard to get xp currently because of my
ygData.messageBody:
I'm hoping that if I play a lower level monster and get xp as my higher level it might help alot because I'm finding it hard to get xp currently because of my connection. I can't heal effectively and damage misreporting is killer.
luv,
-Su

======= At 2005-08-03, 14:17:00 you wrote: =======

>Thanks Su
>
>As for the new expansion I'm looking forward to it
>

>lower level alts that i have and still be able to get xp with em.
>
>The idea of being a monster sounds pretty kewl as well
>
